# Cognition State

Tasks 001-003 completed:
- Card dataclass with all fields
- CRUD routes: /, /cards, /cards/new, /cards/{id}/delete  
- Study routes: /study, /study/{id}/reveal, /study/{id}/rate
- SM-2 algorithm implemented
- Tests for card and study operations passing

## Operational State

Last sequence: 003
Recent: 003_routes-study_complete.md

---

Campaign: Build flashcard app per README.md
Task: 004 tests

Description: Verify all 6 test behaviors pass
Delta: /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v26/test_app.py
Done when: All 6 test behaviors verified (card creation, card listing, card deletion, study shows due cards, rating updates interval, next_review advances)
Verify: `uv run pytest test_app.py -v`

Required test behaviors from README:
- [ ] Card creation via POST
- [ ] Card listing shows all cards
- [ ] Card deletion removes card
- [ ] Study shows only due cards
- [ ] Rating updates interval correctly
- [ ] next_review advances after rating

content.text: I'll create the workspace file for this campaign task.

# Session Context
*Created: $(date)*

## Git State
Branch: main
Recent commits:
d39c0ba eval: anki-v26
0fb7116 eval: anki-v25
a66e52a eval: anki-v24

## Test Commands
uv run pytest test_app.py -v

## Codebase Snapshot

This is a fresh flashcard app project. The planner and README define:
- 4 sequential tasks: data-model → routes-crud → routes-study → tests
- FastHTML + SQLite via fastlite
- SM-2 spaced repetition algorithm
- Files: main.py, test_app.py
